resources.string: Sorry. I am looking for download data from servers for you, right now.

Developers:
Jacek Marchwicki - GAE Server,
Tomasz Merda - Bada Application,
Pawe≈Ç Szafer - Android application.

Application at start should load questionnaire data.
You should see list with questionnaire names.
Choosing one of them move You to screen with posibility
to fill empty questionnaire or to open/edit already filled questionnaire.
 If You want to refresh questionnaire from network just choose appropriate option from menu.
At first load application would show You message: "Sorry. I am looking for download data from servers for you, right now.".
Please, wait a few seconds, application will download needed data from server.

Application loaded section You asked for.
There are 2 headers, Empty questionnaires and Filled questionaires.
If You click first one, You can fill empty questionnaire.
If you click one of filled questionnaire (if list is not empty) You can edit questionnaire.
Long click on filled questionnaire allow You to delete it.
